meta.article_title: September 15, 2014 - Should You Watch the Ball All the Way Into the Racket?

should_you_watch_ball_all_way_into_racke.probleme: Should You Watch the Ball All the Way Into the Racket?

debutant.probleme: Watch slow balls all the way into the racket.
debutant.solution: Watch it until you can no longer react to it.

debutant.probleme: Watch fast balls until perhaps a few feet in front of you.
debutant.solution: Since you can't react at the end anyway.

exercices_complementaires.description: Hit slow balls and focus on seeing contact with the racket.

metriques_progression: Watch ball until you can no longer react to it.
